question: South Asia Food and Nutrition Security Initiative (SAFANSI) was established by the _?
explanation: The South Asia Food and Nutrition Security Initiative (SAFANSI) was established by as a multi-donor trust fund by a joint undertaking of the World Bank, DfID and AusAID. It was conceived in 2008 and formally commenced in 2010 to address the malnutrition problem in South Asia, despite high economic growth in the region.
